title: Be Your Own Advocate!
description:
From checking your bills to getting a second opinion, you are in charge of your health care. Plus, how exercise acts as preventative medicine, and Jillian answers emails about steps you can take when your disease zaps your energy, and more!


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Discount code from this episode:

AlayaNaturals.com, promo code JMPOD for 15% off


This week’s sponsors:

HELLOFRESH.com/jillian80, promo code jillian80 for $80 off your first month

LINKEDIN.com/JILLIAN to get $50 off your first job post 

ROTHYS.com/JILLIANto get your new favorite flats 

RITUAL.com/JILLIAN for 10% off during your first 3 months

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
